ArrayOfAMCDescription.AMCDescription:
• These settings are applicable for ABNN and other associations that have similar business validations only
  • These settings are NOT applicable for ARN or other associations that have similar business validations
  • These settings are applicable for FORM LEVEL only.

• These settings are applicable for ABNN and other associations that have similar business validations only
  • These settings are NOT applicable for ARN or other associations that have similar business validations
  • These settings are applicable for ROW LEVEL only.
